program decrementing
  implicit none
  integer :: n, a(100000) = 0, i, m, g, c = 0
  character(6) :: s(0:1) = (/"First ","Second"/)
  read(*,*) n
  read(*,*) a(1:n)
  do
    m = sum(mod(a,2))
    if (mod(n-m,2) == 1) exit
    c = c+1
    if (m /= 1) exit
    do i = 1, n
      if (mod(a(i),2) == 1) then
        if (a(i) == 1) goto 100
        a(i) = a(i)-1
        exit
      end if
    end do
    g = arr_gcd(a(1:n))
    a(1:n) = a(1:n)/g
  end do
100 write(*,'(a)') trim(s(mod(c,2)))
contains
  integer function arr_gcd(a)
    integer, intent(in) :: a(:)
    integer :: i
    arr_gcd = a(1)
    do i = 2, n
      arr_gcd = gcd(arr_gcd,a(i))
    end do
  end
  integer function gcd(a,b)
    integer, intent(in) :: a, b
    integer :: x, y
    x = max(abs(a),abs(b))
    y = min(abs(a),abs(b))
    do while (y > 0)
      gcd = y
      y = mod(x,y)
      x = gcd
    end do
  end
end program decrementing

First consider an easier version of problem: we don’t divide the integers by their GCD. In
this case, obviously the answer only depends on the parity of the total number of stones. The
original problem also has something to do with parities.Suppose that in your turn all integers are odd. If all integers are one, you can’t perform any
operations and you lose. If not, you can perform an operation, and after the operation exactly
one integer is even and the others are odd (here the GCD doesn’t matter - since GCD is odd
in this case, it doesn’t change the parities). However, if your opponent perform an operation
on the only even number, you will again face the situation where all numbers are odd, and
you will lose eventually.If exactly one integer in your turn is even, you can always win. By performing an operation
in the only even number, you can force the opponent to lose (as described above).By similar observations, we get the following:1. In case there are odd number of even integers, you win. Your strategy is as follows. In
your turn you choose one of even numbers and perform an operation on it. After the
operation there will be two or more odd integers, so the GCD operation doesn’t change
the parities. Thus, in the opponent’s turn there will be even number of even integers,and in your next turn you will again have odd number of even integers. By repeating
this strategy, you always win.2. In case there are even number of even integers and two or more odd integers, you lose.No matter what you do, after your operation the opponent will be given a winning state,as described above.3. In case there are even number of even integers and exactly one odd integer. In this
case, it’s clear that if you perform an operation on one of even integers, you lose (your
opponent will face a winning state). Thus, you must perform an operation on the odd
integer, and after that divide all integers by their GCD. It’s not clear what happens in
this case - just simulate the game and solve the problem recursivelyWhen the simulation happens, all the integers are divided by at least two. Thus, the
number of simulations is O(log(max Ai)). The time complexity of the algorithm above is
O(N log(max Ai)

#import<iostream>
int n,x,s;int main(){std::cin>>n;while(n--){std::cin>>s;x+=s-1;}std::cout<<(x%2?"First":"Second");}

data HowMany = Only | Many | None | Ext1 deriving Eq

main = do
  getLine
  as <- map read.words <$> getLine :: IO [Int]
  putStr $ if solve as then "First" else "Second"

solve :: [Int] -> Bool
solve as
  | odd $ length $ filter even as = True
  | otherwise = inner odds as
  where
  inner Only as = not $ solve $ map (`div`g) as
    where g = foldr1 gcd as'
  inner _ as = False
  (as',odds) = go as None
  go :: [Int] -> HowMany -> ([Int],HowMany)
  go [] _ = ([],None)
  go (a:as) odds
    | a == 1  = ([],Ext1)
    | even a  = (a:rs,odds)
    | odds == Only = ([],Many)
    | odds == None = (a-1:rs,Only)
    where rs = fst $ go as odds

import Data.List

solve :: [Int] -> Bool
solve xs
  | minimum xs == 1    = odd $ sum xs - length xs
  | length xs - p == 1 = not $ solve $! map (`div` q) ys
  | otherwise          = odd p
  where p = length $ filter even xs
        q = foldl1' gcd ys
        ys = map (\x -> if odd x then x - 1 else x) xs

main :: IO ()
main = do
  _ <- getLine
  a <- getLine
  putStrLn $ (\x -> if solve x then "First" else "Second") $ map read $ words a

import Data.List

solve :: [Int] -> Bool
solve xs
  | minimum xs == 1    = odd $ sum xs - length xs
  | p + 1 == length xs = solve' $ map (\x -> if odd x then x - 1 else x) xs
  | otherwise          = odd p
  where p = length $ filter even xs
        solve' x = not $ solve $ map (\x -> div x $ foldl1' gcd xs) x

main :: IO ()
main = do
  _ <- getLine
  a <- getLine
  putStrLn $ (\x -> if solve x then "First" else "Second") $ map read $ words a

solve xs

  | p - 1 == length xs = solve' $ map (\x -> if odd x then x - 1 else x) xs
  | otherwise          = odd p
  where p = length $ filter even xs
        solve' x = not $ solve $ map (\x -> div x $ foldl1' gcd xs) x

  | length xs - p == 1 = solve' $ map (\x -> if odd x then x - 1 else x) xs

data HowMany = Only | Many | None | Ext1 deriving Eq

main = do
  getLine
  as <- map read.words <$> getLine :: IO [Int]
  putStr $ if solve as then "First" else "Second"

solve as
  | odd $ length $ filter even as = True
  | otherwise = inner odds as
  where
  inner Only as = not $ solve $ map (`div`g) as
    where g = foldr1 gcd as'
  inner _ as = False
  (as',odds) = go as None
  go [] odds = ([],odds)
  go (a:as) odds
    | a == 1  = ([],Ext1)
    | even a  = let (rs,odds') = go as odds in (a:rs,odds')
    | odds == Only = (a:as,Many)
    | odds == None = let (rs,odds') = go as Only in (a-1:rs,odds')

n = gets.to_i
a = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
winner = 'Second'

while true
  if a.count(1) == n
    break
  end

  a.sort!
  a[n-1] -= 1
  ms = a.gcd
  a = a.map {|v| v / ms}

  if winner == 'First'
    winner = 'Second'
  else
    winner = 'First'
  end
  p a
end

puts winner

N = gets.to_i
as = gets.split.map(&:to_i)

def finish(first_win)
    puts first_win ? 'First' : 'Second'
    exit
end

first = true
loop do
    odd = 0
    has_one = false
    N.times do |i|
        odd += 1 if as[i] % 2 == 1
        has_one = true if as[i] == 1
    end

    if odd == 0
        N.times do |i|
            as[i] /= 2
        end
    elsif (odd - N) % 2 == 1
        finish(first)
    elsif has_one || odd >= 2
        finish(!first)
    else
        first = !first
        N.times do |i|
            as[i] /= 2
        end
    end
end

  else
    return 0

    $a = explode(" ",$l);
    $key->A = $a;
    $fi++;
    continue;

  if ($fi > 0) {
    $a = explode(" ",$l);
    $key->X[] = $a;
  }
}

  if (($r % 2)!=0) {
    $odd++;
  }
}
$even = $key->A[0]-$odd;

import random
import copy
def gcd(a, b):
	while b:
		a, b = b, a % b
	return a

def gcdm(x):
	g=x[0]
	for i in range(1,len(x)):
		g=gcd(g,x[i])
	return(g)
def candi(x):
	d=dict()
	for i in range(len(x)):
		d[x[i]]=i
	y=list(d.values())
	return(y)
def sto(N,AAA,tryno,isFirst=True):
	AA=copy.deepcopy(AAA)
	ply=0
	moves=[]
	moves_win=[]
	
	if max(AA)<=1: 	return(0,0,True)
	cAA=candi(AA)
	for j in cAA:
		if AA[j]>1:
			win=0
			
			for r in range(tryno):
				A=copy.deepcopy(AA)
				ply=1
				A[j]-=1
				g=gcdm(A)
				A=[x//g for x in A]
				while max(A)>1 and min(A)>1:
					ca=candi(A)
					i=ca[random.randint(0,len(ca)-1)]
					if A[i]>1:
						ply+=1
						A[i]-=1
						g=gcdm(A)
						A=[x//g for x in A]
				ply+=sum(A)-N
				if (ply %2==0)!=isFirst:win+=1
				
			moves.extend([j])
			moves_win.extend([win])
		
	if isFirst:
		player='First'
		ans=max(moves_win)
	else:
		player='Second'
		ans=min(moves_win)
	selected=moves[moves_win.index(ans)]
	#print(AAA)
	#print(cAA)
	#print(moves_win,player,selected)
	
	AAA[selected]-=1
	g=gcdm(AAA)
	AAA=[x//g for x in AAA]
	#print(AAA)
	return([selected,ans,False,AAA])



N=int(input())
AAA=[int(x) for x in input().split()]


tryno=100
F=[]
isFirst=True
while max(AAA)>1 and min(AAA)>1:
	y=sto(N,AAA,tryno,isFirst)
	if y[2]: break
	F.extend([y[0]])
	isFirst=(isFirst!=True)
	AAA=y[3]

judge=len(F)+sum(AAA)-N

if judge%2==1:
	print('First')
else:
	print('Second')

from fractions import gcd
def main():
    n = int(raw_input())
    a = map(int, raw_input().split())
    s = sum(a)
    if n == 1:
        print "Second" if s == 1 else "First"
        return
    gf = [0] * n
    gf[0] = a[0]
    gl = [0] * n
    gl[n-1] = a[n-1]
    for i in xrange(1, n):
        gf[i] = gcd(gf[i-1], a[i])
    for i in xrange(n - 2, -1, -1):
        gl[i] = gcd(gl[i+1], a[i])
    if ((s - 1) / gl[1] - n) % 2 == 0:
        print "First"
        return
    if ((s - 1) / gf[n-2] - n) % 2 == 0:
        print "First"
        return
    for i in xrange(1, n - 1):
        g = gcd(gf[i-1], gl[i+1])
        if ((s - 1) / g - n) % 2 == 0:
            print "First"
            return
    print "First" if (s - n) % 2 else "Second"
main()

import sys
readline = sys.stdin.readline
from functools import reduce
def gcd(a,b):
    while b:
        a, b = b, a%b
    return a

def calc(A):
    N = len(A)
    K = sum(1 for a in A if a % 2 == 0)
    if K & 1:
        return True
    if N-1 != K:
        return False
    A = [a-a%2 for a in A]
    g = reduce(gcd, A)
    A = [a//g for a in A]
    return not calc(A)


N = int(readline())
A = list(map(int, readline().split()))
print('First' if calc(A) else 'Second')

n = int(input().strip())
a = [int(x) for x in input().strip().split()]
sa = sum(a)

p = n % 2
q = sa % 2
r = sum([x % 2 for x in a])
if p + q == 1:
  winner = 0
elif p + q == 0:
  winner = 1
else:
  winner = 0
  fin = 0
  while fin == 0:
    winner = 1 - winner
    r = sum([x % 2 for x in a])
    if r > 1:
      break
    sa = sum(a)
    b = 0
    c = sa - 1
    while c % 2 == 0:
      b += 1
      c /= 2
    d = 2 ** b
    for i in range(len(a)):
      if a[i] % 2 == 0 and a[i] % d != 0:
        fin = 1
        break
      elif a[i] % 2 == 0:
        a[i] /= d
      elif a[i] % 2 == 1 and (a[i] - 1) % d != 0:
        fin = 1
        break
      else:
        a[i] = (a[i] - 1) / d
      
winner_str = 'Second' if winner else 'First'
print(winner_str)

		return(r)

def factorint(n):
	i = 2
	T = []
	while i * i <= n:
		while n % i == 0:
			n //= i
			T.append(i)
		i += 1
	if n > 1:
		T.append(n)
	return(T)

import logging

# create logger
logger = logging.getLogger('simple_example')
logger.setLevel(logging.WARNING)#DEBUG)

# create console handler and set level to debug
ch = logging.StreamHandler()
ch.setLevel(logging.WARNING) #DEBUG)

# create formatter
formatter = logging.Formatter('%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s')

# add formatter to ch
ch.setFormatter(formatter)

# add ch to logger
logger.addHandler(ch)

import copy
N=int(tester())
A=[int(x) for x in tester(N).split()]
A.sort(reverse=False)
logger.debug('A is %s',str(A))

F=dict()
P=dict()
for i in range(N):
	if A[i]==1:
		F[i]={1}
	else:
		F[i]=set(factorint(A[i]))
	for y in F[i]:
		if y not in P.keys():
			P[y]=set()
		P[y].add(i)

G=dict()
for i in F.keys():
	G[i]=set()
	for y in F[i]:
		G[i]=G[i].union(P[y])
	G[i].remove(i)

Ac=list(range(N))
Gc=copy.deepcopy(G)
Tr=dict()
while len(Ac)>0:
	Tmp=[]
	rt=min(Ac)
	me=rt
	Tmp.extend([me])
	Ac.remove(me)
	while len(Gc[me])>0:
		nxt=min(Gc[me])
		if nxt not in Ac:
			Gc[me].remove(nxt)
			continue
		else:
			me=nxt
			Tmp.extend([me])
			Ac.remove(me)
	Tr[rt]=Tmp
	
OoTr=list(Tr.keys())
OoTr.sort(reverse=True)

AnsIdx=[]
for i in OoTr:
	AnsIdx.extend(Tr[i])
Ans=[A[i] for i in AnsIdx]
print(' '.join(list(map(str,Ans))))

logger.removeHandler(ch)

from fractions import gcd
def main():
    n = int(raw_input())
    a = map(int, raw_input().split())
    s = sum(a)
    if n == 1:
        print "Second" if s % 2 else "First"
    gf = [0] * n
    gf[0] = a[0]
    gl = [0] * n
    gl[n-1] = a[n-1]
    for i in xrange(1, n):
        gf[i] = gcd(gf[i-1], a[i])
    for i in xrange(n - 2, -1, -1):
        gl[i] = gcd(gl[i+1], a[i])
    if (s - 1) / gl[1] % 2 == 1:
        print "First"
        return
    if (s - 1) / gf[n-2] % 2 == 1:
        print "First"
        return
    for i in xrange(1, n - 1):
        g = gcd(gf[i-1], gl[i+1])
        if (s - 1) / g % 2 == 1:
            print "First"
            return
    print "Second"
main()

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))
j = 1
k=1
while j:
    s=0
    if 1 in x:
        s = sum(x)-n
        break
    for i in range(n):
        s+= (x[i]+1)%2
        x[i]=x[i]//2
    if s == n-1 and s%2==0:j=1
    else: break
if s %2 != 0:
    print("First")
else:
    print("Second")

from fractions import gcd
def main():
    n = int(raw_input())
    a = map(int, raw_input().split())
    s = sum(a)
    if n == 1:
        print "Second" if s % 2 else "First"
    gf = [0] * n
    gf[0] = a[0]
    gl = [0] * n
    gl[n-1] = a[n-1]
    for i in xrange(1, n):
        gf[i] = gcd(gf[i-1], a[i])
    for i in xrange(n - 2, -1, -1):
        gl[i] = gcd(gl[i+1], a[i])
    if (s - 1) / gl[1] % 2 == 1:
        print "First"
        return
    if (s - 1) / gf[n-2] % 2 == 1:
        print "First"
        return
    for i in xrange(1, n - 1):
        g = gcd(gf[i-1], gl[i+1])
        if (s - 1) / g % 2 == 1:
            print "First"
            return
    print "Second" if s % 2 else "First"
main()

import sys

def I(): return int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
def LI(): return list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))  #空白あり

N = I()
A = LI()

if N == 1:
    print('Second')

import sys
readline = sys.stdin.readline
readlines = sys.stdin.readlines

import numpy as np

N = int(readline())
A = np.array([int(x) for x in readline().split()])

if N == 1:
    print('Second')
    exit()

# np.gcdがバージョン違いでないので仕方なく
def gcd(A):
    B = A.copy()
    while len(B) > 1:
        i = np.argmin(B)
        d = B[i]
        B %= d
        B[i] = d
        B = B[B!=0]
    return B[0]

def can_win(A):
    od = (A&1).sum()
    ev = N-od
    if ev % 2 == 1:
        # 自分は偶数→奇数として、2での約分を拒否し続けられる
        return True
    if od > 1:
        # 逆の立場。永遠に2での約分を拒否されて負け
        return False
    i = np.where(A&1)[0][0]
    if A[i] == 1:
        # これも永遠に2で約分できない
        return False
    # A[i]から1を引いて、約分を試して手渡しするしかない
    A[i] -= 1
    d = gcd(A)
    A //= d
    return not(can_win(A))

answer = 'First' if can_win(A) else 'Second'
print(answer)

import sys

def I(): return int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
def LI(): return list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))  #空白あり

N = I()
A = LI()

if N == 1:
    print('Second')
    exit()

if N == 2:
    print('First')
    exit()

if (sum(A)-N) % 2 == 1:
    print('First')
    exit()

print('Second')

a = int(input())
x =list(map(int, input().split()))#x or y
x.sort()
c = x[0]
s = 0
for i in range(1,a):
    s+=x[i]//c
    if x[i]%c!=0:
        s+=x[i]%c -1
if c !=1:s+=1
if s% 2 == 0:
    print("First")
else:
    print("Second")
